vendor_name.reason: No vendor/company name detected in the document header or top-left area; the top-right shows the large word 'INVOICE' but no issuing organization name is present.

vendor_address.reason: No vendor postal address block visible near the header; only the document title area is present.

vendor_phone.reason: No phone number found in the header or vendor area.

vendor_email.reason: No email address present in the header or elsewhere that appears to be vendor contact.

vendor_website.reason: No website/URL detected on the document.

recipient_name.reason: Text under the 'ISSUED TO:' header shows the first line 'Richard Sanchez' which matches recipient name.

recipient_address.value:
Thynk Unlimited
123 Anywhere St., Any City
recipient_address.normalized_value:
Thynk Unlimited
123 Anywhere St., Any City
recipient_address.reason: Lines beneath the recipient name under 'ISSUED TO:' contain company and address: 'Thynk Unlimited' and '123 Anywhere St., Any City'. Preserved as a multi-line block.

recipient_contact.reason: No explicit recipient phone, email, or additional contact role line was found under the 'ISSUED TO' block beyond name/company/address.

document_title.reason: Prominent title 'INVOICE' at the top-right of the page indicates the document title.

invoice_number.reason: Label 'INVOICE NO:' followed by '01234' on the right-hand side of the header area.

invoice_date.reason: Label 'DATE:' with value '11.02.2030' adjacent to invoice number. Interpreted as DD.MM.YYYY and normalized to ISO-8601.

due_date.reason: Label 'DUE DATE:' with value '11.03.2030' visible; interpreted as DD.MM.YYYY and normalized to ISO-8601.

terms.reason: No explicit 'Terms' or payment-terms phrase (e.g., 'Net 30') was found on the document.

items.reason: A tabular area with headers 'DESCRIPTION', 'UNIT PRICE', 'QTY', 'TOTAL' contains six line rows. Unit prices are shown as '100' and totals as '$100' for each row; quantity '1'. Currency inferred from '$' in the TOTAL column.

item_structure.reason: Inferred template for each line-item row from the table columns: description, unit price, quantity, total (and currency indicator).

subtotal.reason: The totals region shows 'SUBTOTAL' with a printed value of '$400'. Captured verbatim and normalized to numeric 400.

discount.reason: No 'Discount' line or discount amount is visible on the document.

tax_amount.reason: The document shows 'Tax 10%' but does not print a separate tax monetary value. Computed tax amount as TOTAL - SUBTOTAL = 440 - 400 = 40 and provided as normalized numeric value. (Tax monetary value was not explicitly printed.)

tax_rate.reason: Label 'Tax 10%' is visible in the totals area; extracted text '10%' and normalized to numeric percent 10.

total.reason: Prominent 'TOTAL' label with printed amount '$440' in the totals region; normalized to numeric 440.

currency.reason: Monetary values in the totals and totals column show the dollar sign '$'. Normalized to ISO currency 'USD'.

pay_to.reason: Under the 'PAY TO:' block the first line is 'Borcele Bank', indicating the payment recipient/bank.

account_name.reason: Line 'Account Name: Adeline Palmerston' appears under the PAY TO section; captured as the account holder name.

account_number.reason: Line 'Account No.: 0123 4567 8901' appears under PAY TO. Value preserved as displayed; normalized by removing spacing to a continuous digit string.

payment_instructions.reason: No additional free-text payment instructions beyond the 'PAY TO' block and account details were present.

document_id.reason: No distinct document identifier (other than the visible invoice number) or internal file id was found; invoice number captured in invoice_details.invoice_number.

logo_present.reason: No clear company logo or graphic found in the header area; only a decorative horizontal line and the word 'INVOICE' are present.

notes.reason: No footer notes, terms, or additional disclaimers beyond the visible fields were detected.
